citations.narrative:
The facility is conducting regulated activity without a license. The facility has engaged in exhibition of covered species
such as Small Clawed Otters, Skunks, and a Brown Capuchin. As recently as 08 January 2022, animals owned by the
facility participated in exhibition. The animals are housed at both the facility location and another facility at this time. There
are approximately 23 animals that have been identified today that would require a USDA license for exhibition.
Failure to obtain the required license with USDA prevents the Secretary from determining compliance with the Animal
Welfare Act to ensure humane treatment of covered animals. No person shall operate as a dealer, exhibitor, or operator
of an auction sale, without a valid license.
Correct by discontinuing covered activity until a USDA License has been obtained.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the facility representative.
End Section
